title: As The Sun Rises, Morning in Mazatlán
description: Juan and Maria love Saturdays when they get to go to Playa Bonita with their Dad, but getting up before the sun is so hard! Will it be worth it? Discover the stunningly beautiful beaches of Mazatl�n through the eyes of a child. The joys of Banda and the wonder of sea turtles will lure you into the magic of this Mexican seaside city. A picture book for ages 2-5.
author: Carolyn Watson-Dubisch
